description:
'''Emiliano Antonio Zuleta Baquero''' (1912–2005) was a Colombian [[vallenato]] songwriter, [[accordion]] player and singer, popularly known as ''El Viejo Mile'' (The Old Mile).
Around 1938 he wrote "[[La Gota Fría]]", a song that emerged from a [[piqueria vallenata|piqueria]] with {{ill|Lorenzo Morales|es}} and that years later was recorded by [[Carlos Vives]], turning the song into an international hit.
